original: Jacobsson, Herbert Volrath Mikael, major, Göteborg, f. 30/11/78 i Gbg av överste Albert J. o. Davida Möller. G. 09 m. Karin Broström. — Mog:ex. 98, off:ex. 00. Undrlöjtn. v. Göta art:reg. 00, löjtn. 04, kapt. 13, major 27, avsk. 28. Äg. o. beé. Storebergs säteri i Skarab. 1. Ordf. i styr. f. Ängfartygs A-B Tirfing, A-B Sv. Amerika Linien, Försäkr. A-B Atlan-tica, Eriksbergs Mek. Verkst. A-B, A-B Eriksbergs Verkst. Flytdockor, Pens ikassan Posteritas, Gbgs Bogs :-o. Bärgn. A-B, Hall. Ängbåts A-B, A-B Coasting, A-B Atlanttrafik, A-B Oceankomp., Simon Edström A-B, Nora Bergslags Järnv. A-B o. Gbgs sjöfartsmus., v. ordf. i styr. f. Oce-anograf. inst., led. av styr. f. A-B Götaverken m. fl. bol. samt Gbgs trädg:fören. o. Gbgs stadsteater. KN02kl, KVOlkl, RSO, KFirilVRO, RRumSO, NyaSvM, GMbg, FSvFlM, LVVS.
translated: Jacobsson, Herbert Volrath Mikael, Major, Gothenburg, born November 30th, 1878 in Gothenburg to Colonel Albert J. and Davida Möller. Married in 1909 to Karin Broström. Graduated from military school in 1898 and officer school in 1900. Started as Second Lieutenant in Göta Artillery Regiment in 1900, became Lieutenant in 1904, Captain in 1913, Major in 1927 and retired in 1928. Owns and takes care of the Storebergs estate in Skarab. Serves as chairman for the board of directors for Ängfartygs AB Tirfing, AB Swedish America Line, Insurance Company AB Atlantica, Eriksbergs Machine Works AB, AB Eriksbergs Workshops Floating Docks, Pension Fund Posteritas, Gothenburg's Bogsering AB, Hall's Ängbåts AB, AB Coasting, AB Atlantic Traffic, AB Oceankomp., Simon Edström AB, Nora Bergslags Railway AB and Gothenburg's Maritime Museum. Also, a board member of the Oceanographic Institute, and member of the board of directors for AB Götaverken and other companies as well as the Gothenburg Horticultural Society and Gothenburg City Theater. He received the Royal Norwegian Order of Merit (Knight of the 2nd Class), the Royal Order of Vasa (Knight of the 1st Class), the Order of the Sword, the Royal Order of the Polar Star, and the Order of Merit, among others.

awards.name: Royal Order of the Polar Star
